addWrkBtnSubtitle: Search for work in our library
addCoverTipLeadLine: Tips on choose a good image
addCoverTipLine1: Look for an image that illustrates the main topic of the cycle
addCoverTipLine2: Please choose images under Creative Commons licenses. We recommend searching on Unsplash, Flickr, etc.
addComplementaryContentDescription: You can add up to three complementary materials such as reports, infographics, articles etc. Please make sure that any material you add is based on throrough evidence, data and citations.
newCycleTitleLabel: Title of your cycle (80 characters max)
newCycleMainTopicsLabel: Main topics of the cycle (3 max, select most relevant from list)
newCycleTopicsLabel: Additional topics of the cycle (2 max, input freely)
newCyclePitchLabel: Cycle pitch: what is this cycle about and why is it a relevant topic. Why should people join this cycle?
countryFieldLabel: Country or region of focus (if applicable)
Title: Title
cycleAccesPublicInfo: Anyone can join this cycle. Cycle appears in searches
cycleAccesPrivateInfo: Users need to request participation, which is approved by the cycle creator and/or moderator(s). Cycle appears in searches
cycleAccesSecretInfo: Only users invited through a link can see. Cycle does not appear in searches
